ProfileSummary: I am a technology-enthusiast software developer with a strong willingness to learn and analytical thinking skills. My focus is on continuously developing my technical skills and applying my knowledge in challenging projects. I value working in agile and collaborative teams to jointly develop efficient and innovative software solutions.
CoreCompetencies: Extensive experience in developing database-driven web and client applications with C# and .NET
Solid knowledge of relational SQL databases (e.g., MSSQL, MariaDB) and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB)
Expertise in CI/CD pipelines (Azure) and managing container solutions (Docker, Kubernetes)
Certified Microsoft DevOps Engineer with a focus on automation and deployment
Very good experience in agile working methods (Scrum) and close collaboration with interdisciplinary teams
High results orientation, analytical thinking skills, and solution-oriented work approach

Responsibilities: Implementation of CI/CD pipelines for deployment automation
Among other things, development and adaptation of the game server's source code to improve functionality and performance
Implementation of security measures and regular updates to ensure server stability
Technical support and troubleshooting for users
Implementation and maintenance of CI/CD pipelines with Azure DevOps and Jenkins...
Management and optimization of hybrid infrastructures in Azure Cloud and on-premises systems...
Further development of the company portal with C# and ASP.NET...
Development and migration of cloud services with Azure Functions, .NET Core, and Docker...
Creation of unit, integration, and UI tests with MSTest and Selenium...
Active participation in code reviews and continuous improvement...
Creation and maintenance of technical documentation as well as training...
Making inbound and outbound phone calls.
Planning and coordinating appointments with customers and internal teams
Identifying and resolving customer issues and inquiries
Maintaining and expanding customer relationships through regular contact
Creating reports and analyses on sales performance and customer activities
Implementation, installation, configuration, and regular maintenance of servers to ensure smooth operation
Management and support of software and hardware, including performing updates and upgrades
Conducting on-site customer appointments to analyze and resolve technical problems
On-site fault diagnosis and troubleshooting for technical problems to ensure system availability
Advising customers on computers, software, and telecommunication products to meet their needs
Conducting product demonstrations and presentations to explain the benefits and features of the products

DevelopmentAndEducation.Details: During a personal break to care for a close relative, I intensively focused on personal and professional development. During this time, I managed pro-bono projects and gained valuable experience in software development and the DevOps area.
Continuous further education in various programming languages, frameworks, and DevOps practices to always stay up-to-date with technology.
Completion of the certification as DevOps Engineer (Microsoft) to gain in-depth knowledge in automating and optimizing development and deployment processes.
